snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accused Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan of Turkey on Thursday of making a “dark and false” statement.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu accuses Turkish Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan of making false statement by calling Zionism crime against humanity; comment is likely to harm efforts to repair ties between the countries.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accused Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan of Turkey on Thursday of making a “dark and false” statement.
